properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy holy holy
holy Lord of power,
Lord of might.
Heaven and earth
are filled with your glory.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blest and holy,
blest and holy.
He who comes
from God on high.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Raise your voices,
sing his glory.
Praise his name
forever more.
